    • Method Detail

      • trainFactory

        public Train trainFactory​(long _trainId,
                          java.lang.String _destPoint,
                          int _seatsCommon,
                          int _seatsCoupe,
                          int _seatsPl,
                          int _seatsLux,
                          int hour,
                          int minute)
                   throws NotValidAmountOfSeatsException
        This is a factory for all trains in this app. Objects will be created if and only if they pass through validation
        Parameters:
        _trainId - train number
        _destPoint - a place to travel to
        _seatsCommon - amount of seats of type :common
        _seatsCoupe - amount of seats of type :coupe
        _seatsPl - amount of seats of type :platscart
        _seatsLux - amount of seats of type :lux
        hour - departure hour
        minute - departure minute
        Returns:
        newly created instance of class Train
        Throws:
        NotValidAmountOfSeatsException - depend on amount of seats
